class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        diff_list = [nums[ele] - target[ele] for ele in range(len(target))]
        count = 0
        while any(diff_list):
            groups = [list(g) for _, g in groupby(diff_list,lambda n:(n>0)-(n<0))]
            print(groups)
            diff_list = []
            for group in groups:
                moves = min(group,key=abs)
                count += abs(moves)
                diff_list.extend(n-moves for n in group)
        return count
